data.title: On Stage Entertainment
data.meta_description: Experience three days filled with live music, dance, and entertainment from the experts at Operation Pumpkin - Pumpkin and Art Festival. Applications open. Call today for more information.
data.text:
FRIDAY

DJ Ron Perry | 11:30 a.m. - 2:30 p.m.

An Ohio-based DJ, Ron has been spinning music for over 20 years, from NYC to SFO, and everywhere in between.

Outta Here | 5 - 7 p.m.

My Girl Friday | 8 - 10:00 p.m.

My Girl Friday plays a variety of popular 80’s, 90’s, and 2K rock favorites to what’s hot on the radio air waves of today. They leave it all on the stage with high-energy performances, professional musicianship, and incredible harmonies.

SATURDAY

Emily Miller Band | 3 - 4:30 p.m.

Emily Miller brings unique style and artistic ability to her voice that makes her a stand out in the music industry. With each performance, she offers enthusiasm, talent, and creativity in engaging her audience and performing a show that engages and stays with the crowd. She has opened for country star Easton Corbin as well as Grammy-winning bluegrass group, Sister Sadie.

Michelle Robinson Band | 8 - 10:00 p.m.

Nashville recording artist Michelle Robinson is a singer/songwriter based out of Cincinnati, Ohio. Everyone in her band brings a unique style and twist to the music that is performed. Every now and then you will hear a mix of pop/rock and other genres thrown in to fill the sound that is… the Michelle Robinson Band.
